text: Two ships of the Japanese Navy have been named Okinoshima: * was previously the Russian coast defense ship General-Admiral Apraksin launched in 1866 and renamed on capture by Japan in 1905. She was stricken in 1922. * was a minelayer launched in 1935 and sunk in 1942 Category:Japanese Navy ship names Category:Imperial Japanese Navy ship names
title: Japanese ship Okinoshima
